name: Pay Slip Report
query:
SELECT
    employee_name AS `Name`,
    personal_email AS `Email`,
    date_of_joining AS `Date Of Joining`,
    basic_salary AS `Basic Salary`,
    standard_working_days AS `Standard Working Days`,
    actual_working_days AS `Actual Working Days`,
    full_day_working_days AS `Full Day Working`,
    sundays_working_days AS `Sunday Working`,
    half_day_working_days AS `Half Day Working`,
    three_four_quarter_days_working_days AS `3/4 Day Working`,
    quarter_day_working_days AS `Quarter Day Working`,
    lates_days AS `Late Coming Penalty -1 Hour`,
    absent AS `Leaves`,
    full_day_working_amount AS `Full Day Working Amount`,
    sunday_working_amount AS `Sunday Working Amount`,
    half_day_working_amount AS `Half Day Working Amount`,
    three_four_quarter_days_working_amount AS `3/4 Working Day Amount`,
    quarter_day_working_amount AS `Quarter Day Working Amount`,
    lates_amount AS `Lates Amount`,
    total AS `Total Month Salary`,
    adjustments AS `Other Adjustments`,
    other_ernings_holidays_amount AS `Holiday Amount`,
    net_payble_amount AS `Net Payable Amount`
FROM `tabPay Slips`;
